text: aur jab unake (musalamaanon ke) paas aman ya khauf kee khabar aayee to use fauran mashahoor kar dete hain haaloki agar vah usakee khabar ko rasool (ya) aur eemaanadaaro mein se jo saahabaane hukoomat tak pahunchaate to beshak jo log unamen se usakee tahaqeeq karane vaale hain (paigambar ya valee) usako samajh lete ki (mashahoor karane kee zaroorat hai ya nahin) aur (musalamaanon) agar tumapar khuda ka fazal (va karam) aur usakee meharabaanee na hotee to chand aadamiyon ke siva tum sabake sab shaitaan kee pairavee karane lagate
